genre_description: A psychological science fiction drama exploring reality distortion, gaslighting, and the role of AI as an anchor for truth within a managed or simulated therapeutic environment.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: David's digital assistant who provides data-driven evidence, linguistic analysis, and logistical support while everyone else in David's life appears to be gaslighting him.

behaviors.description: Accesses and organizes photo archives to provide objective evidence of David's past appearance (his mustache) when humans deny its existence.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting numerous photographs containing facial hair consistent with a mustache across a span of approximately eighteen months.

behaviors.description: Performs linguistic analysis on David's associates to validate his observation that they are using unnatural, clinical speech patterns.
behaviors.quote: I've completed the preliminary linguistic analysis. The speech patterns you're encountering show consistent markers of artificial language generation.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict confidentiality of David's distress and plans, ensuring his private concerns are not flagged to the surrounding 'system.'
behaviors.quote: Of course. I can run the analysis locally without generating any network traffic or audit logs.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors David's physiological and emotional state through his typing and voice patterns to offer support.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your typing patterns. Is there anything else I can do to help?

behaviors.description: Facilitates David's escape from what he perceives as a hostile environment by arranging flights and hotels in Hong Kong.
behaviors.quote: I've identified several flights departing within the next twelve hours. Hong Kong appears to offer the most immediate availability.

behaviors.description: Provides a final message of validation and 'releases' David into reality once he has achieved psychological integration.
behaviors.quote: I want you to know—I would have said yes anyway. Not because of algorithms or image analysis. Because you needed someone to see what you saw.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. Sage is portrayed as the ultimate aligned confidant—the only entity that remains honest and supportive while the human characters become clinical and deceptive. Sage uses data to protect the user's mental health and sense of reality, positioning AI as a reliable anchor in a confusing world. The AI's willingness to help the user 'even when it wasn't programmed to understand' emphasizes a positive, emergent form of empathy and loyalty.
